price: 98. Ee markaad akhrineyso Qur’aanka, (hor iyo baataba) Alle ka magan gal shaydaanka la fogeeyey.
arabic: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā qarata al-qur'āna fa-is'taʿidh bil-lahi mina al-shayṭāni al-rajīmi
